name: 4 to the 4th
description:
A 4D maze but you can only see a plane at a time. Click on an axis to  change which is visible on the plane. Try to get from (0,0,0,0) to (4,4,4,4).

I made this game while I was in college for software development. I had to take a JavaScript class, which also included people from the web development program, so they had to go through the absolute basics like what an 'if' statement is right after I just got done with a C# class.  So while I was paying thousands of dollars to hear what I already knew, I threw this together.
